nodes.text: Trilon Incorporated was a company that designed and produced the Aggressor-class Assault Fighter as its first purpose-built combat vessel. Due to the Aggressor's remarkable acceleration, the designers found it necessary to add many limiters and safety features in order to keep the vessel's pilot conscious during high-speed maneuvers.

In the new Star Wars canon, Trilon Incorporated was first mentioned in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 8: Scouts, a 1993 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game supplement written by Bill Smith and Bill Olmesdahl.
